callback_with_context.context_function_id: DoIfElse(RootComponent.Dimensions.x > 1900, self.Resize(595, self.Dimensions.y, false), self.Resize(460, self.Dimensions.y, false))
DoIfElse(RootComponent.Dimensions.x > 1900, self.Resize(595, self.Dimensions.y, false), self.Resize(460, self.Dimensions.y, false))

beta_tag.componentleveltooltip: The BETA label means we still have some work to do, so it’s not the finished article. There’s plenty to enjoy, with empires to raise, battles to fight, alliances to forge and enemies to conquer, but we also have a number of bugs to fix, balance-passes to do, and content/systems to improve.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: Do((permitted_cultures = OwnedCultureList.Filter(Key != StoredContext("CcoCultureRecord", "list_box", "lord_select_list").Key)) => { DoIf(permitted_cultures.IsEmpty == false, Component("culture_list").SelectContext(permitted_cultures.At(TrueRandomInRange(0, permitted_cultures.Size - 1)))) }, (lords = OwnedLordListForFaction(StoredContext("CcoCultureRecord", "list_box", "lord_select_list"))) => { DoIf(lords.IsEmpty == false, Component("list_box", "lord_select_list").SelectContext(lords.At(TrueRandomInRange(0, lords.Size - 1)))) })

GetIfElse(UnitList.IsEmpty == false, UnitList, StoredContext("CcoCampaignStartInfo", "button_list", "campaign_select_new").LordListForFaction(StoredContext("CcoCultureRecord", "list_box", "lord_select_list")).FirstContext(FactionRecordContext == this.FactionRecordContext && FrontendFactionLeaderRecordContext != this).UnitList).Sort(UnitRecordContext.Key).Sort(RecruitCost).Sort(UnitRecordContext.ParentGroupSortOrder, true)

culture_list.comment: Fill in the context object and context function in order to populate the available list of options for the dropdown menu

component_text.text: [PH]Grimgor Ironhide is regarded by many as one of the greatest Orc warriors ever to have lived. From the day he staggered out of the Blasted Wastes with his grizzled Immortulz bodyguard in tow, his lust for battle has proved insatiable. His mission is simple : unite the Greenskin tribes and carve a path of destruction across the Old World.

[PH]Orcs and Goblins are the scourge of the Old World. Orcs are built for violence; Goblins, by contrast, are smaller but more cunning. Collectively known as Greenskins, they are an aggressive and brutal race with an unquenchable love of fighting.

[PH]Orcs and Goblins are the scourge of the Old World. Orcs are built for violence; Goblins, by contrast, are smaller but more cunning. Collectively known as Greenskins, they are an aggressive and brutal race with an unquenchable love of fighting.

localised_text.tooltip_text: Click to zoom to province capital.
This settlement is controlled by another faction.

label_context_name.comment: Fill in context object and function to match objects dealing with so can display object. Also feel free to add any other children such as icons want to display for each entry, etc

label_tx.componentleveltooltip: The advisor will appear in the top left-hand of the screen.||If this is your first time playing the game, it is probably a good idea to have the advisor on.
Adjust the scale of all onscreen UI elements.||Scaling above 100% is permitted at 2560x1440 resolution and above.
Adjust the scale of all onscreen UI elements.||Scaling above 100% is permitted at 2560x1440 resolution and above.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: (x = StoredContext("CcoCampaignStartInfo", "button_list", "side_panel_holder").LordListForFaction(this), preselect_lord = Component("29DFE441-5B64-4758-844CE8F6FB4090FE").StoredContext("CcoFrontendFactionLeaderRecord")) => { GetIfElse( preselect_lord && x.Any(preselect_lord == FrontendFactionLeaderRecordContext), x.FirstContext(preselect_lord == FrontendFactionLeaderRecordContext), GetIfElse( x.Any(FrontendFactionLeaderRecordContext.Difficulty == "easy"), x.FirstContext(FrontendFactionLeaderRecordContext.Difficulty == "easy"), x.FirstContext)) }

DoIf(Component("29DFE441-5B64-4758-844CE8F6FB4090FE").StoredContext("CcoFrontendFactionLeaderRecord") == this.FrontendFactionLeaderRecordContext, Do(Component("^2").SelectButton(self), Component("name_and_icon_holder", "lord_details_panel").PropagateContext(this), Component("button_select_lord", "lord_select_holder").PropagateContext(this), Component("details_subpanel", "list_clip").PropagateContext(this), UiMsg("campaign_selected")))

race_button.comment: Fill in context object type with what type need to store for diplay purposes and for passing along. Also feel free to change ContextCommandLeftClick to an initialiser or whatever else you want to handle when selecting an entry. Also feel free to add any other children such as icons want to display for each entry, etc

text_input_autosave_limit.componentleveltooltip: The number of individual save files to keep when using incremental auto-saves.

unit_card.comment: ScottB: The ContextPropagator that passes own context to self for unit record is to make it refresh when change selection, in the event that the list itself isnt refreshed when changed character selection
